Getting Started
===============

This page details how to get started with molecool. Molecool is a package which was developed for the MolSSI Best Practices workshop.

Installation
------------
.. code-block:: python

   pip install mdance

To check for proper installation, run the following command:

.. code-block:: python
    
   python -c "import mdance"
   python -c "print(mdance.__version__)"

Usage
-----
To use MDANCE in a project, import the package and use its modules as follows:

.. code-block:: python

   import mdance

   # Example usage
